Posts.EditableText: I want to make an object be able to detect what's inside certain locked objects.  Is it possible to create a "List Children" type piece of code that will show what's inside an object even if it is otherwise a non-transparent closed object?
Posts.HTML: I want to make an object be able to detect what's inside certain locked objects. Is it possible to create a "List Children" type piece of code that will show what's inside an object even if it is otherwise a non-transparent closed object?

Posts.EditableText:
The `GetAllChildObjects` function returns just such a list.

http://docs.textadventures.co.uk/quest/functions/getallchildobjects.html
Posts.HTML:
The GetAllChildObjects function returns just such a list.

http://docs.textadventures.co.uk/quest/functions/getallchildobjects.html
